Notes.Text:
This update for samba fixes the following issues:

- Fix CVE-2017-2619 regression with 'follow symlinks = no'; (bsc#1036283, bso#12721).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Samba before versions 4.6.1, 4.5.7 and 4.4.11 are vulnerable to a malicious client using a symlink race to allow access to areas of the server file system not exported under the share definition.
